definition: "An adverb commonly used to indicate that something has already happened or is already the case, often used to express a sense of readiness or prior completion. It is frequently employed in various contexts, such as to convey that an action or event has occurred earlier than expected or to emphasize that a particular state or condition is already present."

examples.german: Bereits gestern habe ich das erledigt.
examples.english: I already took care of it yesterday.

examples.german: Sie hat bereits viel Erfahrung in diesem Bereich.
examples.english: She already has a lot of experience in this field.

examples.german: Bereits als Kind war er sehr talentiert.
examples.english: He was already very talented as a child.

examples.german: Bereits jetzt können wir die Auswirkungen spüren.
examples.english: We can already feel the effects now.

examples.german: Bereits morgen wird sich die Situation ändern.
examples.english: The situation will already change tomorrow.
